titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to designate 9-8-8 as the universal telephone number for the purpose of the national suicide prevention and mental health crisis hotline system operating through the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline and through the Veterans Crisis Line, and for other purposes.
National Suicide Hotline Designation Act of 2019
National Suicide Hotline Designation Act of 2019
National Suicide Hotline Designation Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
